name: Cube Fighter 3D
description:
The best fighting game with marvellous pixel characters and beautiful scenery. You will win your way up to the biggest boss. Choose your character choose your opponent and get ready to have the best fight in mobile. Every new enemy will get stronger get ready and show your Kung FU!
You will get addicted from the first fight to the last. You will enjoy your play with really good graphics and you will never want to stop until you beat them all. But it is not easy you must work on your moves.

We are continuously improving the game support us giving 5 stars and reviews ! we love you and we will improve the game non-stop for you. it will always be free.
